pages.title: SAHR Seeker
pages.text: $(bold)Hands free since '93$() Stack nose->tail: ordinance_sarh_seeker, ordinance_core, and either ordinance_fins or ordinance_thruster. Place horizontally with the seeker head forward.

pages.name: Layout
pages.text: Left to right = tail to nose. Thruster or fins (T) at the rear, core (0) mid, seeker head (H) forward.
